title: Well. Looks like everything is hunky-dory overseas!
body:
Everyone loves it, league hasn't bugged out and crashed burning into the ground, it hasn't killed any innocent children yet.
Everything looks A-OK!
10 bans, OCE, come on.
chop chop!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 

**[EDIT]:** THEY ARE OUT! WOOOOO
Thank you Riot!

Never again shall Lee Sin be in any of my games!

replies.body: 10 Bans went live this morning =D let me know what you guys think.

So far I am very impressed!

It takes so much less time for the banning process now _(not that the time ever bothered me anyway, but it is nice having it so short.)_
Ive only played a couple of games with it so far, but It seems great!

I think it will greatly widen the champion pool in many elos. 
It will force the hand of 1 trick players _(which are a menace to have on your team when their champ gets banned, because they can't even perform basic actions)_ to actually learn more of the game, and its champions.

and _(I hope at least)_, it will make the balance team take a closer look at champions who are so hated that they are banned very often, 
My guess is that Yasuo/Fizz will be revisiting the patch notes in the not too distant future. _(a ton of angry Yas mains who cant play Yas is bound to be a force to be reckoned with.)_

It actually feels like Christmas ^^

What do you think about the bans Marauder?

I love it actually. The speed is definitely a bonus but the biggest part is being able to just say I dont want to see this champ this game.

So far I've played 5~ games and had 0 duplicate bans as well haha.

Yea, it is refreshing to not have to worry about your 'arch nemesis' champ, it is a weight off the shoulders. It's a shame that it comes at the price of tactical banning _(They banned Jax, so we will ban Udyr etc)_. 
But I don't think that many people really used bans that way anyway.

So I think this is a definitive improvement.

I haven't seen any duplicate bans yet either _(which came as a surprise, I will say)._ haha xD

Im very glad with the whole thing ^^
I'm expecting to see a lot of duplicate bans as the meta evolves again from this.
Well as soon as I wrote that post I played another game, and both Darius and Annie were duplicate.

Darius I can understand, but Annie isn't that popular in the meta.
Maybe both people just have a hate ban for her.

Like me with Ivern and Vayne.

Im surprised that every game doesn't have a double Darius ban tbh..
Yea I don't have too much trouble with Annie myself, but ill admit it is annoying when she 100-0s you before her stun even ends.

I dont have a problem with Ivern, (I do play him though).
Because you just sit and wait at his red _(or his blue if he starts your blue)_ and kill him instantly as soon as he arrives, becasue his passive takes such a huge toll on his HP and mana, and then he's fucked for the rest of the game.

and fuck vayne.... only Lee Sin's stacked kit is remotely comparable to her bullshit...

Aren't they doing testing in NA live first? 

I reckon OCE will get the 10 ban system last. 

Yea well climate change will end this whole planet if we don't get Trump and the big people who make decisions to take action against climate change!

Humans have little to no effect on climate change. 
Unless you pull terraforming technology out of your arse you wont stop climate change.

30,000 years ago there was an ice age, it happened naturally without humans doing anything, 30,000 years before that was a global warming period just like what people are now calling global warming.

It's a natural cycle of the earth, you can't stop it. Trump can't stop it.

Humans are accelerating the process though, but even you were to throw the whole climate change thing out the window and discard clean energy as a necessity, we can't discard *renewable* energy as a necessity. Coal and oil are finite resources, and if we don't invest in renewable sources like wind and solar then we're just gonna straight up run out. Even if you don't believe in the human contribution to climate change, renewable energy should still be a high priority.

I never said anything for or against renewable energy.
But you wont get any of the major companies actually getting on board with it, until they can't make any money out of oil and coal.

As long as there is oil and coal that's the main focus, because to not use every drop of those resources means wasted profit margins.

Aye, they'll take the immediate money over the security that future proofing would give them naturally :/ It's little comfort to know that if they don't change they'll die eventually because in the meantime their stifling advancement both culturally and developmentally.
And thus why I want the world run by scientists and not politicians!

> [{quoted}](name=Klavinmour,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=eu2wP4bk,comment-id=000100020000000000000000,timestamp=2017-06-08T18:30:07.063+0000)
>
> And thus why I want the world run by scientists and not politicians!

Im sorry, that makes too much sense to ever be considered.

We've gotten a lot of other systems first. We get things first and people complain about us being the "guinea pigs". We get something not first and we're being shafted.

It would be easier to simply accept that Riot does single region tests for good reason (OCE has a small pop so problems have minimal impact and can be addressed quickly, NA has the local resources and the population to properly test something of this nature before it rolls out to other regions) and leave it at that.

We'll get our ten bans when they're good and ready.
any rough estimation of OCE population ? just wondering how small are we compare to other servers, pls let me know if you have any idea about it :) thanks

There was a really old graph that showed the ranked pop of different regions, but it was a long time ago and only showed people that played ranked. The only real info we have is "significantly smaller", but if I had to guess I'd say Cheesyleeks probs isn't too far off.
ooh i see, well i believe we lost many players since that time bcoz League Peak time is over already, well at OCE i would say yes it's over xD hehe

> [{quoted}](name=Dark Warrior,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=eu2wP4bk,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2017-06-07T15:33:44.029+0000)
>
> any rough estimation of OCE population ? just wondering how small are we compare to other servers, pls let me know if you have any idea about it :) thanks

 if i had to geuss maybe 250 000 active players
trump is more likely to start a nuclear war than he is to give a few k to a random homeless, let alone try and save the planet.
Burn it burn it burn it all to ash!
HURRY UP RIOT WE WANT 10 BANS ALREADY
